Events.OnCreate:
(block (destObj) (switch ; This mission only works in Rigel Aurelius (!= (sysGetNode) 'BA) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Player must be ready to challenge The Slicer (!= (typGetData &stBattleArena; 'arenaRank) 'challenger) (msnDestroy gSource)
; The black market station must still be alive (not (setq destObj (sysFindObject gSource "TAN +katamiRescue"))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Set up the mission (block Nil ; Remember the station where Katami is held (msnSetData gSource 'stationID (objGetID destObj))
; Need to override dockscreen action at destination (msnSetData gSource 'paneID (objGetID destObj))
; Register for events (msnRegisterForEvents gSource destObj) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource gPlayerShip)
; Update Katami (typSetData &stBattleArena; 'katamiStatus 'kidnapped) ) ) )
Events.OnAccepted: (block Nil ; Player has met Kate (rpgCharacterSetMeeting &unidKateMorgental;) ; Legacy Kate status (still used in Heretic) (typSetData &svCorporate; 'statusKateM 'ally) )
Events.OnAcceptedUndock:
(block ( (arenaObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (destObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'stationID))) kateMorgentalObj anchorObj )
; Create a marker for the cruiser (setq anchorObj (sysCreateMarker "Morgental cruiser anchor" (sysVectorPolarOffset arenaObj 270 20) &svCorporate;)) (msnSetData gSource 'anchorID (objGetID anchorObj))
; Create Morgental's cruiser (setq kateMorgentalObj (rpgCharacterCreateShip &unidKateMorgental; &scKateMorgentalCruiser; (objGetPos anchorObj) ) )
; Orbit the black market station waiting for the player (shpCancelOrders kateMorgentalObj) (shpOrder kateMorgentalObj 'approach destObj 180) (shpOrder kateMorgentalObj 'fireEvent gSource 'OnKateInPosition) (shpOrder kateMorgentalObj 'orbit destObj 180)
(msnRegisterForEvents gSource kateMorgentalObj) (msnSetData gSource 'kateID (objGetID kateMorgentalObj))
; Set status (msnSetData gSource 'status 'outbound) ; Update player target (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
Events.OnDeclined:
(block Nil ; Player has met Kate (rpgCharacterSetMeeting &unidKateMorgental;) ; Player did not help Kate (rpgCharacterChangeRel &unidKateMorgental; 'opposition) ; Legacy Kate status (still used in Heretic) (typSetData &svCorporate; 'statusKateM 'betrayedKatami)
; Update Katami (typSetData &stBattleArena; 'katamiStatus 'betrayed)
(msnDestroy gSource) )
Events.OnDebriefed: ; Make sure Kate leaves the arena
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
(switch (not (msnGetData gSource 'status)) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'kateID)) 'escort)
(= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'molotok) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) 'attack)
(= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'station) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'stationID)) 'dock) )
Events.OnKateInPosition: (block ( (destObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'stationID))) (kateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'kateID))) (targetObj (sysFindObject destObj "sAN O:guard; +unid:&scMolotok;;")) ) (if targetObj (block Nil (objSendMessage gPlayerShip kateObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgKateInPosition)) (msnSetData gSource 'status 'molotok) (msnSetData gSource 'targetID (objGetID targetObj)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource targetObj) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) ) (block Nil (objSendMessage gPlayerShip kateObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgInBoundHot)) (msnSetData gSource 'status 'station) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) (shpCancelOrders kateObj) (if (objIsAbandoned destObj) (shpOrder kateObj 'dock destObj) (shpOrder kateObj 'attack destObj) ) ) ) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(switch ; We don't care if an object ascends or enters a stargate (or (= aDestroyReason 'ascended) (= aDestroyReason 'enteredStargate)) Nil
; If Kate dies, the mission fails. (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'kateID)) (block Nil (if (msnGetProperty gSource 'isCompleted) (typSetData &stBattleArena; 'katamiStatus 'dead) )
(dbgOutput "Kate killed") (rpgCharacterSetStatus &unidKateMorgental; 'dead) (msnFailure gSource)
; If player destroyed Kate's ship, then she remembers (if (and gPlayerShip (= aOrderGiver gPlayerShip)) (block Nil (rpgCharacterChangeRel &unidKateMorgental; 'betrayal) (typSetData &svCorporate; 'statusKateM 'destroyedByPlayer) ) (typSetData &svCorporate; 'statusKateM 'destroyed) ) )
(and (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) (= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'molotok)) (block ( (kateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'kateID))) (destObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'stationID))) ) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip kateObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgInBoundHot)) (msnSetData gSource 'status 'station) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) (shpCancelOrders kateObj) (if (objIsAbandoned destObj) (shpOrder kateObj 'dock destObj) (shpOrder kateObj 'attack destObj) ) )
(= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'stationID)) (block ( (kateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'kateID))) ) ; Disable action replacement, turn on dockscreen override (msnSetData gSource 'paneID Nil) (msnSetData gSource 'destID (objGetID aObjDestroyed))
(msnSetData gSource 'status 'station) (shpCancelOrders kateObj) (shpOrder kateObj 'dock aObjDestroyed) ) )
Events.OnCompleted:
(switch ; Katami rescued (= aReason 'success) (block ( (kateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'kateID))) (anchorObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'anchorID))) ) (typSetData &stBattleArena; 'katamiStatus 'rescued) (rpgCharacterChangeRel &unidKateMorgental; 'aid) (shpCancelOrders kateObj) (shpOrder kateObj 'goto anchorObj) (shpOrder kateObj 'wait 5) (shpOrder kateObj 'gate) )
; Rescue fail (= aReason 'failure) Nil )

Language.Text:
You enter the gladiators' quarters but there is no sign of Mr. Katami. You see Kate Morgental in his office looking through his files. She turns to you:
"%name%, Mr. Katami is gone! He's been taken by the Black Market. I found a message that says that they will kill him if you go ahead with the fight with The Slicer!"

You enter the gladiators' quarters but there is no sign of Mr. Katami. A woman in an expensive suit is looking through Katami's files. She turns to you:
"You must be %name%; I'm glad you're here. I'm Kate Morgental. I received a message from the Black Market: They have captured Katami and they're threatening to kill him if you fight The Slicer!"

"Katami was my old trainer and he means a lot to me. And the Black Market doesn't scare me; they're just the parasites of the Corporate universe."
"Help me to rescue him and you'll be able to defeat The Slicer without risking Katami's life."

"I knew you would agree! I will not forget this."
"They're keeping Katami at the Black Market station in the outer asteroid field. Go to those coordinates and destroy the Molotok guarding the base. When you've cleared the area I'll blast the station and rescue Katami! Deal?"
"Alright, let's go!"

Kate looks deflated, but quickly composes herself. She gives you a sharp look.
"Nothing in it for you, huh? I clearly misjudged you. Go take care of yourself! I don't need your help!"

You receive a message from Kate:
"Are you on your way? Get to the Black Market station and clear out those defenders!"

Mr. Katami meets you at the docking bay.
"I owe you my life! The only way I can begin to repay you is to help you to defeat The Slicer. Here, take this ROM biosoft. It may save your life."
We're in position. Now destroy that Molotok.
Nice work! Clear the area; we're inbound hot!

Men grab you and take you before the station boss:
"There's no need to talk; you know what you need to do. Just stay out of the Arena and your friend will be fine." He turns towards his bodyguards, "Get %him% out of here!"
You see movement in the smoking remains of the station. Any survivors are unlikely to want to talk first so you decide to wait for Kate.

You enter the smoking remains of the station. You follow the sounds of gunfire and find Kate Morgental leading a team of armored men. They are unbinding Mr. Katami, who seems to be weak but otherwise unharmed.
Kate flashes you a thumbs up: "Thanks for your help—we'll get him back safely! See you back at the Arena: You've got a date with The Slicer!"
